snippet: Antonio Conte says Chelsea have exceeded expectations this season but the Italian manager is confident his side will use their experience to avoid succumbing to the pressure of being top of the Premier League table....

headline.main: Conte Believes Chelsea Will Embrace Pressure at the Top
headline.print_headline: Conte Believes Chelsea Will Embrace Pressure at the Top

lead_paragraph: Antonio Conte says Chelsea have exceeded expectations this season but the Italian manager is confident his side will use their experience to avoid succumbing to the pressure of being top of the Premier League table.

snippet: David McNally has resigned as chief executive of Premier League Norwich City, the club said on their website (www.canaries.co.uk) on Monday....
lead_paragraph: David McNally has resigned as chief executive of Premier League Norwich City, the club said on their website (www.canaries.co.uk) on Monday.

snippet: Hull City's Adama Diomande has been banned for three games after the Premier League club opted not to appeal against the striker's violent conduct charge by the Football Association (FA)....

headline.main: Hull's Diomande Banned for Three Games for Violent Conduct
headline.print_headline: Hull's Diomande Banned for Three Games for Violent Conduct

lead_paragraph: Hull City's Adama Diomande has been banned for three games after the Premier League club opted not to appeal against the striker's violent conduct charge by the Football Association (FA).

snippet: Jose Mourinho explained how happy he was with his Manchester United project on Friday, acknowledging that it was "easy to feel at home" with one of the world's biggest clubs....

headline.main: United Beginning to Feel Like Home for Happy Mourinho
headline.print_headline: United Beginning to Feel Like Home for Happy Mourinho

lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho explained how happy he was with his Manchester United project on Friday, acknowledging that it was "easy to feel at home" with one of the world's biggest clubs.

snippet: Back-to-back Premier League defeats by Liverpool and Arsenal in September forced Chelsea manager Antonio Conte to adopt the tactics that have sent his team on an 11-match winning run in the top flight....

headline.main: Conte Says Liverpool, Arsenal Defeats Forced Him to Act
headline.print_headline: Conte Says Liverpool, Arsenal Defeats Forced Him to Act

lead_paragraph: Back-to-back Premier League defeats by Liverpool and Arsenal in September forced Chelsea manager Antonio Conte to adopt the tactics that have sent his team on an 11-match winning run in the top flight.

snippet: Manchester United midfielder Henrikh Mkhitaryan understands that competition for places kept him out of manager Jose Mourinho's plans but is determined to show he deserves a first-team spot....

headline.main: United's Mkhitaryan Determined to Hold On to Starting Spot
headline.print_headline: United's Mkhitaryan Determined to Hold On to Starting Spot

lead_paragraph: Manchester United midfielder Henrikh Mkhitaryan understands that competition for places kept him out of manager Jose Mourinho's plans but is determined to show he deserves a first-team spot.

snippet: After enjoying a fairytale run with Wales at Euro 2016, defender Neil Taylor is desperate for 'that winning feeling' to return at Swansea City....

headline.main: Frustrated Taylor Wants 'Winning Feeling' Back at Swansea
headline.print_headline: Frustrated Taylor Wants 'Winning Feeling' Back at Swansea

lead_paragraph: After enjoying a fairytale run with Wales at Euro 2016, defender Neil Taylor is desperate for 'that winning feeling' to return at Swansea City.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur steamed into the top four as Harry Kane marked his 100th Premier League appearance with a double in a 4-1 thrashing of a woeful Watford on Sunday....

headline.main: Kane and Alli Strike Twice as Tottenham Crush Watford
headline.print_headline: Kane and Alli Strike Twice as Tottenham Crush Watford

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur steamed into the top four as Harry Kane marked his 100th Premier League appearance with a double in a 4-1 thrashing of a woeful Watford on Sunday.

snippet: Hal Robson-Kanu marked his first start for West Bromwich Albion by smashing in a spectacular goal to secure a 2-1 comeback Premier League win at Southampton on Saturday....

headline.main: Robson-Kanu Hits Winner in First West Brom Start
headline.print_headline: Robson-Kanu Hits Winner in First West Brom Start

lead_paragraph: Hal Robson-Kanu marked his first start for West Bromwich Albion by smashing in a spectacular goal to secure a 2-1 comeback Premier League win at Southampton on Saturday.

snippet: The much-anticipated clash between Liverpool and Manchester City at Anfield on Saturday looks like a knockout to determine who can challenge Chelsea for the Premier League title....

headline.main: Liverpool, Manchester City Bid to Stay on Chelsea's Heels
headline.print_headline: Liverpool, Manchester City Bid to Stay on Chelsea's Heels

lead_paragraph: The much-anticipated clash between Liverpool and Manchester City at Anfield on Saturday looks like a knockout to determine who can challenge Chelsea for the Premier League title.
